title: UPDATE 5-ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifier 2018 Scoreboard
text: March 12, 2018 / 2:17 PM / Updated 5 hours ago UPDATE 5-ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifier 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 4 Min Read Mar 12 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of match 20 between
